group_1.textRight: You knew from the start, didn't you? You@knew what I was scared of.

group_1.textLeft: It's been quite a while since you were here.
I haven't peeped at your memories since@Iroha became the leader.

group_1.textRight: I can't read you, which just makes you@more suspicious.

group_1.textLeft: My, my, I'm telling the truth! I think I'll @excuse myself if you keep this up.

group_1.textRight: But you worked on both of us at the same@time because you...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I think you might have the right idea,@Iroha.
I wanted you two to be in sync, so that if@something were to happen to Yachiyo...
But it seems I was overthinking it.

group_1.textRight: Either way, I'm grateful for your @thoughtfulness.
Well then, Iroha, shall we get going?

group_1.textLeft: I hope you get your team back together. In@the meantime, I'll give you some freebies.

group_1.textRight: So you're throwing out your rule against@playing favorites? Is that all right?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's not it at all! I lend my power to@reinforce the bonds we all share.

group_1.textRight: You'd better stop before you end up in@dangerous waters.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I'll keep your advice in mind.

group_1.narration: I managed to stop feeling so afraid.
I stopped being afraid of my future,@and of the chance Iroha gave me.
It's time to bring an end to everything I @left behind.
I have punched tickets for those two@one last time...

group_1.textRight: Don't force yourself to open it, Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not forcing myself. There's no reason@for me to hesitate now.
(By reading them, I can finally move on...)
You can look, too, if you like.

group_1.textRight: Oh, but I never knew Kanae or Mel.

group_1.textLeft: These must be Kanae's notes for lyrics.
But it looks like she hadn't gotten around@to organizing them into songs.

group_1.textRight: And this is a record of Mel's fortune@telling and some other notes...

group_1.narration: I'm just a point@Standing up for myself in the world@To survive here I have to stay sharp@To dirty my hands real ugly
You pull me up by those stained hands@And tell me to get myself clean@But your blunt words just break me down
One point will pierce through on its own@Two points will slash together as a line@With three, the edges start to soften, melt@Form a circle, round the edges
I never thought that my way into the future@Could ever feel this kind@Just by holding hands
As strange phenomena occur in Kamihama,@they may bring about some big upheavals.@However, many points will form a pattern:@the gentle shape of a ring.
Perhaps it's a ring of people.@Maybe a ring spun by us Magical Girls.@These times are the most dangerous yet@but will also be full of mutual kindness.
A lone star will present the opportunity.@That star must symbolize a person.@And it falls near Yachiyo.
I don't know if this person is the cause@but I'm excited to meet them nonetheless.
Because the star falling by Yachiyo@means I'll definitely get to meet them too.
They must be me, and Mifuyu, and Kanae@herself.
And the future that Mel wrote about...
It must be what's happening to us right now.

group_1.textRight: Let's go together, to that kind future.@Let's form that circle together.

group_1.textLeft: But to make that happen, we'll need to@rescue the others...
